Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: BACKGROUND : Renal dysfunction induced by iodinated contrast medium ( CM ) administration can minimize the benefit of the interventional procedure in patients undergoing renal angioplasty ( PTRA ) .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Renal dysfunction |
| Iodinated contrast medium-induced renal dysfunction |
| Patients undergoing renal angioplasty |
| PTRA patients (Patients undergoing renal angioplasty) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Iodinated contrast medium-induced renal dysfunction |
| Renal dysfunction |

The term "renal dysfunction induced by iodinated contrast medium administration" can be broken down into "iodinated contrast medium-induced renal dysfunction" and "renal dysfunction" as separate entities. The former refers to the specific condition caused by the contrast medium, while the latter is a broader term for any impairment of renal function. The other entities in the paragraph, such as "interventional procedure" and "patients undergoing renal angioplasty (PTRA)", do not clearly refer to diseases.
